name: Blood Toils Tears and Sweat
description:
Survive the historical setting during WWII as a simple farmer. Work at your farm with sweaty palms. Don’t get too sad about your losses. Germans will repay in blood!

To survive, plant your ammo, defend your buildings and cattle, get paid in blood money. Survive the blitz or die trying!

This game was created during a Game Jam!

Created by
Vanilj (Sofie Bresäter)
Jawsarn (Christian Markowicz)
